Bridgy Fed bot user for Bluesky. To bridge your fediverse account to Bluesky, follow this account or reply yes if it prompts you with a DM. More info here.

This is an account to help flipboard users discover important people in the fediverse whose opinions matter .... called tdf for "The Daily Fediverse" as I look daily for interesting things. I'm a professor of history and write about early modern European religious and political cultures. Currently finishing a concise history of "The Empire's Reformations". Helped create the Holocaust museum in DC, ages ago. For several years, I've been co-PI on a DH project dedicated to "Shared Churches in Early Modern Europe." I also edit "Spektrum" and "Studies in Central European Histories." RT ≠ endorsement. he/him/his

note:
Dies ist die Holocaust-Erinnerungs-Ausstellung Anne Frank in Norden unter der Leitung von Dr. Jörg Wolfgang Rademacher und @ErikUden.

Wir sehen unsere Hauptaufgabe darin sogenannte Zweitzeugen (Zeitzeugen zweiter Generation) zu schaffen um den Staffelstab der Erinnerung weiterzugeben für eine gesunde Erinnerungskultur in Deutschland sowie der gesamten Welt.

Dies geschieht über diverse Ausstellungen in Kooperation mit dem Anne Frank Huis in Amsterdam sowie dem Anne Frank Zentrum in Berlin, über welche wir Schüler*Innen zu Peer Guides ausbilden welche dann diese Ausstellungen eigenständig leiten und weiteren Schüler*Innen von deutscher Geschichte sowie Fragen von Moral und Ethik belehren.

Alle Bilder unter CC-BY-SA :cc_cc:​ :cc_by:​ :cc_sa:​
Bei Texten oder Sonstiges kontaktieren Sie uns bitte.

In a world filled with constant noise & distractions, I find solace in the simple things in life, the unspoiled beauty of nature. A way to connect with the Earth and find inner peace. I hope to leave behind a legacy of my love for #nature through my #photography, hoping to inspire others to find their own sense of solitude in the beauty of the world that surrounds them.
I invite you to slow down, breathe in the simple beauty & feel the deep sense of tranquility . All of my work is copyrighted.

I'm just this dragon. I'm transgender. I'm a little bit zooey. I'm artistic: that amounts to some graphite pencil art, some stories I read for a critique group, and a little bit of haiku poetry. I have some specific interests in philosophy, but I am heavily biased toward the analytic school. I post pictures of my cats wherever I can get away with it.

i am a creator specializing in the creation of digital and physical artworks using artificial intelligence. I find it fascinating how machine learning and neural networks are able to generate creative ideas and designs, some of which are even more surprising and innovative than what the human mind could create on its own.

In my work, I try to explore the boundaries of AI and art and explore new possibilities of artistic expression.
